name: Apple-Plum Cake
author: YehuditO
summary: This plum cake uses wholesome ingredients for very tasty results!
ingredients: 2 ½ cups whole wheat pastry flour
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, and nutmeg into a large bowl
Toss 1/2 of the apples and 1/2 of the plums into the flour mixture
Place remaining apples and plums in a second bowl and toss with melted butter
Mix together sugar, applesauce, orange juice, oil, eggs, ginger, and vanilla extract in a third bowl
Mix together sugar and cinnamon in a small, fourth bowl
Fold applesauce mixture into the flour mixture until just moistened
Pour 1/2 of the batter into the prepared baking pan and layer with apples and plums
Pour remaining batter on top and sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 50 minutes
